import random

from folium.plugins import HeatMap, HeatMapWithTime

import IPython

import scipy

from warnings import filterwarnings

source.aef4f282:
figure = plt.figure(figsize=(16,10))

axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.Orthographic(central_longitude,central_latitude))
axis_func.set_global()
axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=1)
axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='black',linewidth=2)

axis_func.set_extent(extent_real)


plt.contourf(M1_longitude, M1_latitude, M1_rhoa, transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")
plt.contourf(T1_longitude, T1_latitude, T1_rhoa, transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")

color_bar_func = plt.colorbar(ax=axis_func, orientation="vertical", pad=0.05, aspect=16, shrink=0.5)
color_bar_func.ax.tick_params(labelsize=5)

plt.title(M1_DATA.variables["rhoa"].long_name)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

for x_sample_key in DATA_2_KEY_LIST:    
    
    
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(16,10))

    axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.Orthographic(central_longitude,central_latitude))
    axis_func.set_global()
    axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=1)
    axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='black',linewidth=2)

    axis_func.set_extent(extent_real)


    plt.contourf(M2_longitude, M2_latitude, M2_DATA.variables[x_sample_key][0,:,:], transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")
    plt.contourf(T2_longitude, T2_latitude, T2_DATA.variables[x_sample_key][0,:,:], transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")

    color_bar_func = plt.colorbar(ax=axis_func, orientation="vertical", pad=0.05, aspect=16, shrink=0.5)
    color_bar_func.ax.tick_params(labelsize=5)

    plt.title(M2_DATA.variables[x_sample_key].long_name)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()

source.a024b249:
figure = plt.figure(figsize=(16,5))
                        
plt.plot(M1_DATA.variables["rhoa"][0,:,:].flatten(), color="black",label="MADAGASCAR")
                        
plt.plot(T1_DATA.variables["rhoa"][0,:,:].flatten(), color="red",label="TURKEY")


plt.title(M1_DATA.variables["rhoa"].long_name)
plt.legend()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
